questions.question: What was the Renaissance?

choices.answer: a period--during the thirteenth century--of renewed interest in ancient civ
a period of artistic and literary achievements in Europe
the eighteenth-century era of renewed interest in classical Greece and Rome
the rebirth of classical learning in the Middle East
